messages.message:
Useful feedback from a Commercial trial prospect:
• Found it weird/confusing that Converse and Build were separate apps
• UX is a bit difficult to follow, especially when adding fields and having to rewrite the Extract prompt that has been copied from the Name 
• Struggled to use Table extraction
• Users were expecting some ability to correct errors during Build and 'improve the model' --> they were unaware that refining the prompt was the right approach to improve performance
I had a similar conversation with a partner prospect today about refining the prompt to improve performance.
